text: John David Ashton (February 22, 1948 - September 26, 2024) was an American actor. He was known for his roles in the movies Beverly Hills Cop, Beverly Hills Cop II, and Midnight Run. Ashton died at his home in Fort Collins, Colorado from cancer on September 26, 2024 at the age of 76. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2024 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Massachusetts Category:People from Springfield, Massachusetts Category:Cancer deaths in Colorado
title: John Ashton (actor)
